title.native: 最凶の支援職【話術士】である俺は世界最強クランを従える
title.romaji: Saikyou no Shien-shoku [Wajutsushi] Dearu Ore wa Sekai Saikyou Clan wo Shitagaeru
title.english: The Most Notorious "Talker" Runs the World's Greatest Clan

description:
Noel is the grandson of legendary Seeker Overdeath and dreams of surpassing his strength. But it turns out that Noel is nothing but a Talker, the weakest class of them all. Undeterred, he uses his silver tongue to gather allies, develop cunning strategies, and form the greatest clan around. Now, as the most notorious Talker, Noel will do whatever it takes to claim supremacy.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

Note: Each episode streamed a week in advance on some streaming services. The original TV broadcast started on October 7th, 2024.

tags.name: Anti-Hero
tags.description: Features a protagonist who lacks conventional heroic attributes and may be considered a borderline villain.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Shapeshifting
tags.description: Features character(s) who changes one's appearance or form.

tags.name: Mafia
tags.description: Centered around Italian organised crime syndicates.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Steampunk
tags.description: Prominently features technology and designs inspired by 19th-century industrial steam-powered machinery.

tags.name: Delinquents
tags.description: Features characters with a notorious image and attitude, sometimes referred to as "yankees".

tags.name: Revenge
tags.description: Prominently features a character who aims to exact punishment in a resentful or vindictive manner.

tags.name: Yandere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is obsessively in love with another, to the point of acting deranged or violent.

tags.name: Guns
tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

tags.name: Slavery
tags.description: Prominently features slaves, slavery, or slave trade.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

A freelance designer. He hasn't been active as an animator in over a decade.

__Birth Name:__ Honami Furuhara (ふるはら ほなみ)
__Residency:__ Tokyo, Japan
__Graduated:__ Kanda University of International Studies

__[Website](https://aaamyyy.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/amy0aaamyyy) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCG5334b6jsxZ3suJCL0YYpw) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/5YCsKCBbhMHBKBh2MllF5d)__

__AAAMYYY__, alternatively known as Amy, is a Japanese vocalist, lyricist and member of the three-piece rock band Tempalay. She is personally under record label SPACE SHOWER MUSIC (2019–).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/kohta_yamabook) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yamabook_kohta/) | [Website](https://www.kohtayamamoto.net/)

Formerly affiliated with Legendoor, he is now in business partnership with VV-ALKLINE.

[Twitter](https://x.com/saiki_bandmaid) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/saiki_bandmaid/)

__Saiki Atsumi__ is a Japanese vocalist and lyricist. She is the lead vocalist of the rock band [BAND-MAID](https://anilist.co/staff/136557/BANDMAID).

[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/achmad_priyatna_mc/)

Achmad Priyatna also known as Supriyatna is an Indonesian voice actor and MC for various events.

[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/fafaefr/) 

Indonesian Voice Actor and Quality Control affiliated with ATM Studio Indonesia
And Indonesian Voice Actor and ADR Engineer.
Sharon Haring is an Indonesian voice actress and ADR Director.
